page.title: 07Poringland Government
page.content: Basically a 3 tier system where Poringland Parish council operates under S.Norfolk District Council, which is operates under NCC.Parish council is non-political,dealing mainly with small scale planning, footpaths and open spaces and social events.Its 11 members are elected every 4 years and meets monthly in the village hall. POLITICS: Most of Poringland voted Tory in the last general election.It is generally felt the goverment spends too much on defence,but local Tories seem otherwise satisfied with both the NCC and the parish council, but many have little interest or involvement with the latter. SOCIAL: Poringland offers a wide selection of shops, amenities, organisations which attract and keep residents content.
